The GOTY edition is just the regular, updated game packaged with codes to download the DLC packs.

This IS legit, just useless.

This is working fine BUT all DLC come as coupons inside the game box and must be downloaded separately via XBox Live, so they are not embedded in this download.

Something you should also know, if you want to play the first 2 DLC (Ned & Moxxi) installed from that bundle disc ( http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5488315/Borderlands.Addon.Pack.XBOX360-MARVEL%28Unpacked%29 ) they will NOT work with this version of Borderlands. This version only accepts non-bundled dlc content.

According to the info all the addons are supposed to be included in this GOTY version, therefore the packs for the non-GOTY version donÂ´t work with this.
